attacks.name: Rapids
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon has any Energy cards attached to it, flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of those Energy cards and discard it.

attacks.name: Water Punch
attacks.effect: Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Energy attached to Misty's Poliwhirl. This attack does 30 damage plus 10 damage for each heads.
